rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your programs.)[/i]
When this Subroutine enters, you create two 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature tokens with flying, draw two cards, and gain 2 life.
Whenever this Subroutine leaves the battlefield or runs, you sacrifice a creature, discard a card, and lose 1 life.
notes:
!tokens Program B EIW
